text: I love this place! I grew up down the street - its a great neighbourhood place. Whenever I visit Toronto, I always visit. The bruschetta is to die for. I also love the gnocci and pizza.

This place needs to get their act together. Flavors are off. Tomato sauce needs some help, same for flavor of fillings in pasta. Quite a disappointment. The place looks nice and hip, but food is not good. Service is OK, nothing special. No need to come back.
Never disappointed with this place.  Have been going there for decades, even after ownership changes, their food has stayed consistent, generous and never disappoints.
